response.overview: It's just a regular day... that is, until a twist of fate happens and you find yourself in a totally different state of mind. Sound familiar? It certainly does to Sharon Spitz. Sharon finally gets up the courage to tell Alden she likes him, but her cell phone message is unexpectedly delivered to Brock! Definitely an unexpected twist, but the twist starts to turn when Alden invites sharon out on a date. The day of her dreams have finally come! That is, if nature doesn't have its own plans.
response.tagline: Life is full of twists and turns, but Braceface always seems to make it through with a tin smile.
response.title: Braceface: Twist of Fate
